languages.text: "Я знаю, что ты изо всех сил старал{mf|ся|ась} сдержать данное обещание, элантах. И пусть в твоем языке недостаточно красок и смыслов, чтобы описать, сколь много это значит для моих собратьев. Как это важно для меня...". {n}Голос Ирлиэт на секунду растворяется в тишине.{/n} "Я благодарна. И выполню свою часть договора — поделюсь координатами схрона моих собратьев. И ты получишь награду, достойную твоих стараний, элантах".

"I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, что ты изо всех сил старал{mf|ся|ась} сдержать данное обещание, элантах. И пусть в твоем языке недостаточно красок и смыслов, чтобы описать, сколь много это значит для моих собратьев. Как это важно для меня...". {n}Голос Ирлиэт на секунду растворяется в тишине.{/n} "Я благодарна. И выполню свою часть договора — поделюсь координатами схрона моих собратьев. И ты получишь награду, достойную твоих стараний, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantaсh. And there are not enough colours and meanings in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinsmen's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

languages.text: “我知道，你已经尽了你最大的努力来遵守诺言，外界人。我无法用你们的语言表达，这一切对我的族人有多么重要……对我有多么重要……”{n}有那么一瞬间，伊莉耶特的声音似乎变成了耳语。{/n}“我很感激。我会像我承诺的那样，把我亲族藏匿宝藏的位置告诉你。你会得到与你的努力相称的奖赏，外界人。”
languages.original_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

traits.locale_text: “我知道，你已经尽了你最大的努力来遵守诺言，外界人。我无法用你们的语言表达，这一切对我的族人有多么重要……对我有多么重要……”{n}有那么一瞬间，伊莉耶特的声音似乎变成了耳语。{/n}“我很感激。我会像我承诺的那样，把我亲族藏匿宝藏的位置告诉你。你会得到与你的努力相称的奖赏，外界人。”

languages.text: « Je sais que vous avez fait de votre mieux pour tenir votre promesse, elantach, et votre langue ne dispose pas d'assez de couleurs et de nuances pour décrire ce que cela représente pour mon peuple. Ce que cela représente pour moi... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « Je vous en suis reconnaissante et je remplirai ma part du marché en vous communiquant les coordonnées de la cache de mes semblables. Votre récompense sera à la hauteur de vos efforts, elantach. »
languages.original_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que vous avez fait de votre mieux pour tenir votre promesse, elantach, et votre langue ne dispose pas d'assez de couleurs et de nuances pour décrire ce que cela représente pour mon peuple. Ce que cela représente pour moi... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « Je vous en suis reconnaissante et je remplirai ma part du marché en vous communiquant les coordonnées de la cache de mes semblables. Votre récompense sera à la hauteur de vos efforts, elantach. »

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass Ihr Euer Bestes getan habt, um Euer Versprechen einzuhalten, Elantach. Und Eure Sprache bietet nicht genug Farben und Schattierungen, um zu beschreiben, wie viel das meinem Volk bedeutet. Wie viel es mir bedeutet ..." {n}Für einen kurzen Augenblick ertrinkt Yrliets Stimme in der Stille.{/n} "Ich bin dankbar. Und auch ich werde meinen Teil der Abmachung erfüllen. Ich teile Euch die Koordinaten des Lagers meines Volks mit. Dort werdet Ihr eine Belohnung finden, die Eure Mühen rechtfertigt, Elantach."
languages.original_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass Ihr Euer Bestes getan habt, um Euer Versprechen einzuhalten, Elantaсh. Und Eure Sprache bietet nicht genug Farben und Schattierungen, um zu beschreiben, wie viel das meinem Volk bedeutet. Wie viel es mir bedeutet ..." {n}Für einen kurzen Augenblick ertrinkt Yrliets Stimme in der Stille.{/n} "Ich bin dankbar. Und auch ich werde meinen Teil der Abmachung erfüllen. Ich teile Euch die Koordinaten des Lagers meines Volks mit. Dort werdet Ihr eine Belohnung finden, die Eure Mühen rechtfertigt, Elantach."

languages.text: «Sé que hizo lo pudo para mantener su promesa, elantach. Y no hay suficientes expresiones ni matices en su idioma para describir lo mucho que agradezco su ayuda. Significa tanto para mí...». {n}Yrliet permanece en silencio durante unos instantes.{/n} «Estoy muy agradecida, y cumpliré mi parte del acuerdo compartiéndole las coordenadas de nuestro alijo. Es una recompensa bien merecida, elantach».
languages.original_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que hizo lo pudo para mantener su promesa, elantach. Y no hay suficientes expresiones ni matices en su idioma para describir lo mucho que agradezco su ayuda. Significa tanto para mí...». {n}Yrliet permanece en silencio durante unos instantes.{/n} «Estoy muy agradecida, y cumpliré mi parte del acuerdo compartiéndole las coordenadas de nuestro alijo. Es una recompensa bien merecida, elantach».

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなたが約束を守ろうと最善を尽くしたことは知っている。それが我が種族にとってどれほどの意味を持つか、あなた方の言語では十分な色やニュアンスで表現できないほどだ。我にとっても…」{n}しばらくの間、ユリエットの声は沈黙にかき消された。{/n}「感謝している。そして、我が血族の隠し場所の座標を共有することで、取引を果たすつもりだ。あなたの努力に見合った報酬を与えよう、エランタ」
languages.original_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなたが約束を守ろうと最善を尽くしたことは知っている。それが我が種族にとってどれほどの意味を持つか、あなた方の言語では十分な色やニュアンスで表現できないほどだ。我にとっても…」{n}しばらくの間、ユリエットの声は沈黙にかき消された。{/n}「感謝している。そして、我が血族の隠し場所の座標を共有することで、取引を果たすつもりだ。あなたの努力に見合った報酬を与えよう、エランタ」

languages.text: "Sözünü mümkün mertebe tutmaya çalıştığını biliyorum elantach. Soydaşlarım için bunun anlamını ifade etmeye yetecek renk ve doku, lisanınızda yok. Yaptıkların benim için o kadar değerli ki..." {n}Yrliet'in sesi bir an için sessizliğe teslim oluyor.{/n} "Minnettarım. Söz verdiğim gibi soydaşlarımın zulasını bulabileceğin koordinatları sana vereceğim. Çabalarının karşılığını alacaksın elantach."
languages.original_text: "I know that you have tried your best to keep your promise, elantach. And there are not enough colours and undertones in your language to describe how much that means to my kind. How much it means to me..." {n}For a brief moment, Yrliet's voice is drowned in silence.{/n} "I'm grateful. And I will fulfil my end of the bargain by sharing the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts, elantach."
